comment.caption: Senator Truman Greets the Managers of the St. Louis Cardinals and the St. Louis Browns at the 1944 World Series
comment.note: Senator Harry S. Truman, Democratic party candidate for Vice-President of the United States, at the 1944 World Series in St. Louis, Missouri, between the St. Louis Browns and the St. Louis Cardinals. Pictured from left to right: Donald Lee Barnes, owner of the Browns; Luke Sewell, manager of the Browns; Senator Harry S. Truman, D-MO; Billy Southworth, manager of the Cardinals; and Sam Breadon, owner of the Cardinals.
